casebody.data:
KEN WIRE & METAL PRODUCTS, INC., Appellant, v. COLUMBIA BROADCASTING SYSTEMS, INC., Appellee. No. 8, Docket 72-1116. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Sept. 19, 1972. Decided Sept. 26, 1972. William R. Liberman, New York City, for appellant. Gerald Walpin, New York City, for appellee.

Before SMITH, KAUFMAN and MANSFIELD, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The prior art fully anticipated the appellant’s patent. The judgment is affirmed on the basis of Judge Tenney’s opinion below. 338 F.Supp. 624 (1971).
